lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the steamer Merlin, Capt. SAMPSON, at this port, we have received files of The royal Gazette and Bermuda Herald to the 23d September. The House of Assembly had passed a resolution providing that foreign steam-packets be subjected to no greater Light-dues than British steam-packets.
